channel.title: Axoloti guitar preamp
channel.description:
Hi İ am a computer engineer student and İ want work on DSP and İ want a build device like this
Preamp+ İr player + Multi effect in same time
https://youtu.be/fK28RJUaE2U
Can I ise axoloti for this ? If I cant what can use for this ?
Thanks

item.title: Axoloti guitar preamp
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Atm I'm using a palmer pocket amp.
It's quite decent for the price.

I've had an AMT SS11a wich is superp, tube based 3 channel preamp.

For the future I want to build a preamp with the korg nutube and Amt pangaea loading impulse responses:
https://amtelectronics.com/new/amt-pangaea-cp-16a-6f22/

Read full topic

item.title: Axoloti guitar preamp
item.dc:creator: @Rauch Kayahan
item.description:
@Rauch wrote:

Hi What do you use preamp and cabsim in analog section thnx

Read full topic

item.title: Axoloti guitar preamp
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

I think in this context axoloti would really shine as effects processor and or looper but as Jaffa pointed out it is limited.
What I do atm is do something like this
Analogpreamp/Ampsim/Cabsim --> Axoloti FX <--> Axoloti Looper

And I am quite happy getting the best from analog and digital world.

Read full topic

item.title: Axoloti guitar preamp
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

If you want to do any kind of amp modelling, I don't think Axoloti is good choice, as it can be pretty dsp/cpu intensive to do so.

There are some effects in the stomp category, but not much.

Besides that there is an convolution object, called filter/convolution. using a 1024 samples cab file, it will take 66% of Axolotis dsp, which is also a lot:

Short Convolution (Guitar Cabinet Modeling) Patching
I know that it would introduce delays and require a lot of DSP horsepower, but being able to use extremely short impulses for guitar cabinet modeling would be wonderful. I know there was some requests for iFFT capabilities before. Is this possible right now? Is it planned? Are there other ways to model cabinets with filters?

Read full topic
